6x HCW Falchion

3
Arshwikk
Wednesday, August 23rd, 2017, 1:44:06 PM

a glowing elven warblade, 6x, 3lbs (max lught), HCW

A close examination of the weapon reveals fine detail and diligent craftsmanship. Engravings traverse the length of the blade, depicting a stand of glowbark trees, off-set by a gryphon in flight with an oak leaf clasped in one talon. The style and substance of the images are a clear indication of the weapon's Ardenai origins, though the fierce cerulean glow suffusing the blade is without obvious explanation. You see nothing unusual, except for a small enchanter's glyph.

19k BS, 26M, 115 paypal verified or GoA verified
